title: Sticks and Stones Clay Oven Pizza
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Organic, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Local wood-fired pizza place that offers vegan Daiya cheese, and NC vegan chicken options can be substituted on the pizza. Lots of local, seasonal, and organic veggies as well. Rustic-style interior decoration and twinkle lights.
